attributes.action: Vote in no conference in the government  over brexit plan.
attributes.additional_details: The government has gone against the will of this country and icnore are wishes of the leave voters  to leave on the 29 march and the delaying again  and I think time to ask the government to step down. I feel the government has broken the law made promises but could not keep them.
attributes.background: We had a referendum in 2016 to leave the EU the people had there votes 17.4 million had there say and won. We have the right to leave on what we voted no deals

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence.

We used to accept petitions that called for a vote of no confidence. However, the Petitions Committee can’t schedule votes of no confidence. This was often frustrating and disappointing for petitioners. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that. 
Petitions calling for action on policy are more likely to be an effective way of achieving the change you want.
